annotations.normalized_text: Johns Hopkins Center for Health Security

text: @realDonaldTrump President Trump I pray that you’ll check this out. Event 201: On October 18, 2019, the Johns Hopkins Center for Health Security, partnered with the World Economic Forum and the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation hosted Event 201 which simulated a coronavirus exercise. God bless.
